text: I don’t know if you copied and pasted but there is a typo in your env variable, it has an extra “A” `JULIA_NUM_THREADAS` should read `JULIA_NUM_THREADS`

elements.text: I don’t know if you copied and pasted but there is a typo in your env variable, it has an extra “A”

text: sorry that typo only exists here. In my case I tested in Julia REPL which works just fine, reporting the specified number of threads
